title: One&Only Reethi Rah, Maldives offers ultimate honeymoon packages - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
One&Only Reethi Rah, Maldives offers ultimate honeymoon packages Published on : Tuesday, October 13, 2015
Reserve a seven night stay at One&Only Reethi Rah, Maldives to enjoy your piece of paradise in the middle of the Indian Ocean for a dream honeymoon to mark a very special occasion with your loved one.
Throughout your stay, you can enjoy supreme indulgence in the luxurious resort, making the time on the island truly unforgettable and One&Only occasion. One&Only Reethi Rah provides the perfect getaway for intimate celebrations.
Starting from (USD 2,110) onwards per night, the offer includes:
· Mini wedding cake on first night turndown
· 30-minute complimentary photo shoot session and 1 complimentary picture
· Welcome bed decoration
· Personalised embroidery kaftans and love pillows set up in the villa
· Champagne sobering ritual
· Bath ritual
· Coral frame ritual to conserve your love
· Couples spa ritual
